com.norconex.collector.http.fetch

Class HttpFetchClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.norconex.collector.http.fetch.HttpFetchClient

  • public class HttpFetchClient
extends Object
    Fetches HTTP resources, trying all configured http fetchers, defaulting to GenericHttpFetcher with default configuration if none are defined.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Pascal Essiembre
